attributes.additional_details:
I would vote for a reform in government but again the lack of trust means a vote in no confidence in anyone in parliament so I will urge anyone to vote to close Parliament and vote for a royal takeover until such time we can agree on someone who can speak honestly and justifiably for the people.

Not as a fat cat with a silver spoon who has never worked a day in their scruffy ragabone lives!!

This petition is only to point out that there is no justice and won’t ever be seen!
attributes.background:
They have sold off our countries borders gave away our resources, demolished our advanced technology and cut funds to thoughs who need it most
All while they and they’re rich fat chums eat humble pie

The icing on the cake is the lack of respect shown for democracy! How can we trust any of them?
